description:
The Miyoshi brothers have powerful regenerative capabilities.  They say that taking life is offering salvation, and in them Shungiku sees his own younger self.  Oooka, who knows the old Shungiku, is doubtful he can win the battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gを切り裂く慈合い斬り!!
The Compassion Slash That Cuts G!!
